title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing unleavened bread in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing unleavened bread in a dream. It is an Egyptian food as it was presented by the ancient Egyptians to get closer to the gods and it began to spread in many areas. Mushrooms are nutritious pies because they contain useful ingredients and eating them in the dream expresses wonderful food and abundance in one’s life, and we will convey to you the interpretation related to the interpretation of the dream of seeing unleavened bread in The next dream, follow us. Interpretation of dreams about seeing unleavened pies by Ibn Sirin. Through the following points we will tell you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing unleavened pies. Ibn Sirin narrated that he saw pies in a dream, indicating that what the dreamer desires will come true. As for seeing unleavened bread, it also indicates deception and the dreamer will fall. In a plot.Seeing pies in a dream symbolizes sincere relationships.Seeing unleavened bread in a dream is a warning to the dreamer to beware of haters and enemies around the dreamer.Interpretation of a dream of unleavened bread for a single womanWe will tell you, through the following points, the interpretation of seeing various unleavened bread.Seeing pastries in a dream for an unmarried woman A married woman, which is still in the form of dough, means good news for her. Also, seeing unleavened bread in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the time of marriage is approaching. Seeing pastries in a dream indicates the fulfillment of one woman’s desire in her life. As for seeing warm pastries in The dream indicates that you will live a life full of happiness, joy, and a happy life. Also, when you see unleavened bread in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates that her life is full of goodness and blessings. Seeing a girl with white dough indicates her good morals and spontaneity. Seeing unleavened bread indicates that she is hasty in Her decisions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing unleavened bread for a married woman. Seeing baked goods made from unleavened bread in a married woman’s dream means that she will bear a great responsibility. Also, seeing unleavened bread in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness and blessings in her life. Seeing warm, unleavened bread in a dream indicates a happy life. Interpretation Dream of seeing unleavened bread for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman with unleavened bread in a dream indicates her good health. Puffing pastries in a dream for a pregnant woman also symbolizes good luck. Seeing her eating unleavened bread in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her fetus is in good health. Eating pies in a dream Seeing one eating unleavened bread in A dream indicates stability in life and calm, and eating them in a dream expresses a wonderful diet and abundance in one’s life. Seeing him eating pancakes expresses the collapse of worries and problems that he faces. If a single girl sees that she is preparing pancakes in a dream, her vision indicates that she is able to manage Her life affairs and acting wisely. And if she sees that she is eating it, then her vision expresses that she is entering into romantic relationships that do not suit her and she should be careful. Eating pancakes for a pregnant woman is evidence of ease, comfort, health and childbirth for the baby. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating pancakes, this means that she is assuming her responsibility and ability. To raise her children well. Buying pastries in a dream. Seeing buying baked goods indicates goodness and livelihood for the pioneer. The unmarried girl who sees in a

title: Saying God is sufficient and He is the best agent in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: We think of God and He is the best disposer of affairs in a dream. Hisba or saying “Allah is sufficient and He is the best disposer of affairs” is a means by which we seek refuge in God - Glory be to Him - when we receive injustice from some people or feel upset and distressed and we want to ask the Creator for help to remove sorrows and worries from our chest and the explanations we will explain in a little. Details in this article. We consider God and He is the best disposer of affairs in the dream. Among the most important interpretations received by interpretation scholars regarding the dream “God is sufficient for us and He is the best guardian” are the following: Seeing the phrase “God is sufficient for me and He is the best agent” in a dream indicates the anguish and anguish that afflicts the dreamer’s chest. And he wants to get rid of it. Whoever dreams says: “God is sufficient for me and He is the best trustworthy person.” This is a sign of the loss of sadness and grief from his heart, and the dream symbolizes that he is a religious person with good morals and trusts God Almighty in all matters of his life. And if he supplicates in his sleep, his God is sufficient and the best actor against those who wronged him while he is awake. This is a sign that the Lord - the Almighty - will hold him accountable for his injustice in his life. . Before his death and vice versa. If the dreamer is a businessman and is facing financial difficulties in this period of his life, and he sees himself saying: “God is sufficient for me and He is the best disposer of affairs,” then this is good news for abundant livelihood. Soon for him. All the dreams that you are thinking of will find their interpretation here. A website about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. We have reached God, and He is the best disposer of affairs in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The venerable Imam Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that if a person is sick and the doctors are unable to find a cure for his condition, yet he is patient. I am confident in the wisdom of God Almighty. The Most High - and he saw in his dream that he was repeating the saying, “My Lord is sufficient and He is the best steward of health and well-being as a reward for his reward and reward on behalf of God. In the event that a person desires to achieve many goals and hopes and is unable, and a dream says: “God is sufficient for me and He is the best of those close to me,” then this leads to Achieving what he wants. If a person is wronged and feels disappointed because he does not find anyone to help him regain his lost rights and repeats the calculation during his sleep, this proves the compensation that he will receive, God willing. When a young man sees in his dream that he is saying, “God is sufficient for me, and He is the best disposer of affairs,” and it is in reality If he is unemployed and does not find money to help him meet his needs, this symbolizes that he will receive goodness. A job opportunity will be the beginning of a bright future. We consider God and He is the best disposer of affairs in a single woman’s dream. Learn with us about the most important clues mentioned in the interpretation of the dream: God is sufficient for us and He is the best disposer of affairs for a single girl: Our Lord is sufficient and He is the best disposer of affairs in a single woman’s dream, symbolizing that she is facing injustice Great in her life, but she will regain her lost rights, God willing. If a girl says in her dream that God arrives and is the best disposer of affairs, this is an indication that she feels great psychological pain due to not getting married yet, and the people around her are scolding her with words that she does not want. To hear him, turn to God Almighty. And if a girl is engaged to a young man who does not suit her, and she dreams, God is sufficient for us, and He is the best disposer of affairs, as this leads to their separation and liberation from a life full of sadness and sorrow. The torment that you can live with. If the girl is a student and faces some difficulties in her studies

title: Learn about the interpretation of a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A mouse in a dream for a single woman is one of the dreams that may not be good in many cases, as the mouse is a rodent that people fear and disgust, because of its constant presence in dirty places and among garbage. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman has meanings and meanings. a lot. If she sees that she is very afraid of them, this indicates the presence of bad friends who are trying to attract her and she must stay away from them. However, if she sees that she is safe with the presence of a mouse during her sleep, this indicates the presence of a bad man in her life, and this indicates that the dream revolves around people who come into her life at will. They are deceitful and deceitful and want to be associated with her, which indicates the need to be careful in choosing who to associate with, and it may indicate the presence of hypocrites around her that he does not know. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the presence of a group of red mice is evidence of her being crazy. . If she sees a mouse in her dream and listens to his words with interest, this is evidence that she is creating new good friendships in her life. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman by Imam Al-SadiqThe Imam believes that the girl who sees the mouse in her dream is suffering from severe psychological pressure and says that if some people bite, this means That one of her friends close to her heart will hurt her and she will suffer a lot. From this for a long period of time, and if the girl sees in her dream that she is chasing a mouse and killing it, this is a sign that she will get rid of the problems that are haunting her in her life, but if she sees that she is chasing it and then holding it in her hand, then this is a sign that she will get into big trouble, and the Imam says that Seeing this dream over and over again indicates that the dreamer is constantly thinking about some bad things, or the dreamer is committing many sins, and he must repent for them. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that a mouse in a dream of an unmarried woman has many meanings and connotations, This depends on the condition of each dreamer. Dead meat means that she will buy a maid, and she will be a maid who is not trusted with her money and her family. Ibn Shaheen classified mice in a dream according to their color and number, and he believes that if a girl sees only one and it is white, then this is a sign that she will feed in abundance, and if she sees many white mice in a dream. This dream of hers is evidence that she will go through many crises, even though the mice are white and numerous, this indicates that there are people near her who want to harm her. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a single woman: Seeing a single girl in her house with many mice indicates her obsession and morbid fear of seeing them in reality. If she sees a group of white and black mice, this means that she will be freed from all temptation and evil. , strong will.Interpretation of a white mouse in a dream for a single woman.Interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a white mouse in her dream has many indicators, some of which may be good if she is not afraid in the dream, which indicates that her wedding date is approaching and that she will have a generous person who will please her. It gets better, and it could be a sign of p

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing maftool or couscous in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see maftool or couscous in a dream and its meanings. Dishes and recipes differ among the Arab peoples according to their customs and traditions. Each region is distinguished by its dishes that are referred to immediately after they are mentioned. This diversity of recipes and foods has reached various interpretations that scholars have discussed for clarification. During the discussion of food in this article, we will see the interpretation of the dream of seeing maftool or couscous in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing maftool or couscous in a dream: Maftoul is one of the famous popular dishes in Palestine, as it is prepared from flour. Wheat is a long and cumbersome process, but its delicious taste is worth it, and a mixture of cooked vegetables is added to the dish when served for lunch. Boiled, but is it a good sign for the fortune teller or not to see maftool in a dream, and here we put in your hands the interpretation of the dream of seeing maftool or couscous in a dream: Seeing maftool in a dream is considered a good vision because it is linked to happy occasions for many people. Some also see evil in a dream A sign of relief from the suffering that the dreamer is going through. When a person sees that he is preparing and cooking maftoul in a dream, this means that the dreamer will receive a promotion in his position. If the person is without a job or position, he will obtain a new job and a high position. Seeing maftoul or couscous is considered In a dream, it is good news for many dream interpreters. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sun in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing maftool eating in a dream for a married woman. Maftoul is considered a delicious and healthy meal at the same time, as it is prepared on invitation tables and gatherings of family and loved ones, and this dish is very popular in Different parts of the Arab world, especially in the Maghreb countries, where it is called couscous and is prepared by adding other types of vegetables different from those found in Palestine. Here we explain to you the interpretation and meaning of seeing a married woman eating maftoul in a dream: Eating maftoul with red meat in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer will receive sustenance from God until he becomes rich after poverty. While eating food in a dream is an indication of the abundant and good food that the Lord will receive by God’s command. Eating couscous with chicken or white meat is a gospel for the sick person to heal him from every illness and pain. The same applies to eating red meat with maftoul in a dream, as it is good news for the patient’s recovery. Whereas seeing maftoul or couscous in a sinner’s dream is not considered a good vision. It is an indication that the dreamer has committed a lot of disobedience and sins, and therefore he must return and seek refuge. To God. If a married woman sees herself eating couscous, but its taste is sour, this indicates that there are difficulties and problems on her way. But seeing a man eating sugar-free couscous in a dream means that he will gain money after difficulties and hardships. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing rice in a dream and a dream Eating rice in detail. Interpretation of a dream about hatred for a married woman. Making maftoul goes through several stages, the most important of which is maftoul, where wheat flour or semolina is collected by adding a spray

title: Interpretation of the name Delilah in a dream

preview.html: Delilah is a Hebrew female name, meaning lover, caresser, pleasant. Famously, Jewess seduced Samson the Great and handed him over to the Philistines on charges of treason. Delilah in Arabic: clear argument and proof. As for dream interpretation, the name Delilah means clarity and good future. It is said that it is a good sign for those who see a woman named Delilah smiling at him. The name Delilah also indicates the end of doubt and verification with certainty. The name is said to indicate the exposure of treachery and treachery. It's a good name to translate when I hear it and when I write it. It is good for a middle-aged woman to appear in a dream and wear a beautiful dress and greet the dreamer joyfully. The meaning of hearing the name Delilah in a dreamHearing the name Delilah in a dream indicates a sign, an argument, and evidence. It gives certainty to those who have expressed doubts and doubts. It is a good indicator for the convict, the accused and the prisoner. The name Delilah is also a joy for those who heard it in a dream spoken by a woman or a girl. Interpretation of the name Delilah for a lonely girl: It means guidance and kindness to those who feel confused, anxious, afraid, or about to do something they fear. It is a symbol of kindness if the owner of the name is known for good character. The best interpretation of the meaning of the name Delilah is that Delilah appeared in the unfolding dream, not getting angry and heading towards insight without thinking. Loaded with good looking gifts or treats and kind words. If he appears with disheveled hair, puffy eyes, or a thin body, it means bad luck and deprivation. It is not good to see her crying, hungry, imprisoned, or sick, and it is not good to see her sleeping or sick. Interpretation of the name Dalila for a married woman: The name Dalila Mahmoud is for a married woman, if in a dream she is fat or she sees the married woman giving her clothes or food. Its meaning in a dream is the best evidence and evidence for coverage. It is a good interpretation for someone who has been kindled in the fire of doubt or jealousy. It is commendable for a married woman who suffers from oppression and oppression. It is good to see her veiled or covered with her head and hair, and if she is adorned or brilliant, this means seduction. Because the name Delilah is interpreted with two meanings, one of which is Hebrew, meaning strife and turmoil, according to the story of Samson and Delilah. The second concept is evidence, which we often rely on in expressing vision. Delilah hates the dream if she appears naked or shows bad and immodest talk. Otherwise, her vision remains praiseworthy for married and pregnant women. The meaning of the name Delilah in a dreamThe name Delilah is praiseworthy in the dream of a divorced woman, especially if she sees in a dream her childhood friend whose name is Delilah or her old neighbor. Its meaning in interpretation is the best proof and proof of glory after calamity, torment, or evil. Especially if that Delilah is smiling and cheerful and not wrinkled or angry. Therefore, if a woman sees something good in her time, such as apples and grapes, then the woman has seen something good in this world after long patience. The meaning of the name Delilah in a man’s dreamThe name Delilah in a man’s dream has two aspects in interpretation: seduction and turmoil If Delilah appears as a young lady with long hair . This interpretation goes back to the story of Delilah who seduced Samson. As for the second interpretation, it is praised by E

Loaded with good looking gifts or treats and kind words. If he appears with disheveled hair, puffy eyes, or a thin body, it means bad luck and deprivation. It is not good to see her crying, hungry, imprisoned, or sick, and it is not good to see her sleeping or sick. Interpretation of the name Dalila for a married woman: The name Dalila Mahmoud is for a married woman, if in a dream she is fat or she sees the married woman giving her clothes or food. Its meaning in a dream is the best evidence and evidence for coverage. It is a good interpretation for someone who has been kindled in the fire of doubt or jealousy. It is commendable for a married woman who suffers from oppression and oppression. It is good to see her veiled or covered with her head and hair, and if she is adorned or brilliant, this means seduction. Because the name Delilah is interpreted with two meanings, one of which is Hebrew, meaning strife and turmoil, according to the story of Samson and Delilah. The second concept is evidence, which we often rely on in expressing vision. Delilah hates the dream if she appears naked or shows bad and immodest talk. Otherwise, her vision remains praiseworthy for married and pregnant women. The meaning of the name Delilah in a dreamThe name Delilah is praiseworthy in the dream of a divorced woman, especially if she sees in a dream her childhood friend whose name is Delilah or her old neighbor. Its meaning in interpretation is the best proof and proof of glory after calamity, torment, or evil. Especially if that Delilah is smiling and cheerful and not wrinkled or angry. Therefore, if a woman sees something good in her time, such as apples and grapes, then the woman has seen something good in this world after long patience. The meaning of the name Delilah in a man’s dreamThe name Delilah in a man’s dream has two aspects in interpretation: seduction and turmoil If Delilah appears as a young lady with long hair . This interpretation goes back to the story of Delilah who seduced Samson. As for the second interpretation, it is praised by E

title: Mentioning the name of God in a dream

preview.html: Mentioning the name of God in a dream. Mentioning the name of God in a dream indicates happy and joyful news and the fulfillment of desires that you want to achieve. Mentioning the name of God in a dream also indicates the death of anxiety and anxiety that make a person’s life miserable and unable to achieve things. Mentioning the name of God in a dream indicates It indicates the avoidance of desires, the narrator’s victory over them, and the avoidance of disobedience and transgressions. It also indicates the acquisition of food and goodness, the dreamer’s abundance, and his victory over the whisperings of Satan. Mentioning the name of God in a dream indicates the dreamer’s guidance, integrity, and avoiding forbidden things that anger God. Mentioning the name of God in a dream has signs that indicate... The goodness and condition of the person who sees it. It also suggests tranquility and comfort of the heart and mind from the distraction of the issues he faces in his life at this time. And do not forget to read our article about: The name of Muhammad in a dream for an unmarried and divorced woman. Mentioning the name of God in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that mentioning the name of God In a dream there are good visions. Which brings a lot of good grace and abundance, and an abundance of money and livelihood. But with all this, there are also some bad omens, depending on the type of dream of the narrator. There are pros and cons in the dream according to what the narrator said. Mentioning the name of God in a dream for a girl Alone. Mentioning the name of God in a dream to an unmarried girl indicates that she is far away from worry and anxiety and achieving everything she wants to achieve in her life. Frequently mentioning the name of God in a woman’s dream with her tongue indicates the nearness of comfort, the death of sadness and suffering, and the fulfillment of her hopes in life. If she sees an unmarried girl in a dream That she says, “Glory be to God,” this also means that she has overcome everything that is difficult in her life. As well as her keeping away from major sins and forbidden things, and her adherence to her religion, and the correctness of her condition. Mentioning the name of God in a married woman’s dream indicates the death of worry, anxiety, sadness, and hearing good and joyful news. It also indicates the entry of many well-wishers into her home, comfort in her condition and abundance of goodness. Mentioning the name of God in a married woman’s dream portends the passage of hardships and adversity and the overcoming of illness and misery. It indicates that she will be blessed with good offspring, her family, and marital stability. It also indicates overcoming Mentioning the name of God in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the problems of pregnancy and childbirth will disappear. It indicates that the birth process will be easy, effortless, and without consequences. It indicates that the birth process will be easy, effortless, and without consequences. God in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the pregnancy has passed without problems and the fetus is born in good health. title: Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Earthquakes are mentioned in the book Interpretation of Dreams in the thirty-eighth chapter devoted to the interpretation of natural phenomena and disasters in dreams, entitled (Earthquakes and Earthquakes). As Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams in a dream as if the earth is quaking and a group of people descend to it, they are safe and no harm has touched them, then the ruler descends on that earth or tramples on it. It was said in the interpretation: An earthquake in a dream indicates a serious illness or weakness and is a sign of problems, worries and illnesses. Whoever sees in his dream that the mountains are trembling or trembling and then stabilizes, then the force of that place or place will hit him hard and leave him. An earthquake in a dream indicates injustice, oppression, tyranny, and sadness. It also indicates unrest or conflict that could destabilize the security of the subjects and the state. Whoever hears an earthquake Earth in his dream, sadness will fall on its people, and an earthquake also indicates aggression and loss, if it leaves in the dream horrific scenes such as the collapse of houses and the death of animals. Some interpreters said: Earthquakes and eclipses are evil harbingers for all people, and they are a harbinger of death, loss, and the loss of good things. An earthquake in a dream can To point to itself and it is a warning to the dreamer of a terrible event such as accidents and natural disasters. If one dreams in a dream that the earth is moving under his feet or sees that it is tilting right and left, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s movement and a change in his intentions in life, winning and living. An earthquake in a dream may indicate the need Or need or poverty, which is a sign of loss for the merchant. An earthquake indicates damage to crops, destruction of tillage, or interruption of resources, if it is catastrophic or destructive. The occurrence of an earthquake in a man’s dream indicates fear of danger and lack of appreciation of things. An earthquake in some ancient interpretations of the Arabs indicates a shift or shift from one state to another, The transformation can be positive if the earthquake does not leave the vision in ruins or destruction. Source: From the book Interpretation of Great Dreams by Ibn Sirin, adapted from the publisher.

title: Interpretation of seeing a specific person in a dream by Ibn Sirin is a symbol of repeating the dream of a specific person several times in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the repetition of seeing a specific person in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are many dreams that a person sees while sleeping and wants to know their interpretation and specific meanings, such as seeing someone repeatedly or working to track people who the dreamer may not actually know. And their interpretation, such as the repetition of the same person in one dream in a dream, is a close marriage by the command of God, and you may receive a blessing and financial support and a child. In another interpretation, seeing an enemy of yours in a dream is evidence of peace, affection, and improving relations between you. Each vision has different interpretations and parts that are presented in detail in this article. Follow the interpretation of the dream to see a specific person you know in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin interprets seeing familiar people in a dream as a lot of thinking about the person in reality, and the vision is reflected in the psychological state of the dreamer, as it affects him with joy and happiness when he is awake. In another interpretation, the many problems with a lover or friend bring his vision in a dream, a desire from the subconscious to get rid of these problems soon. Familiar people in a dream are good or bad, depending on the psychological state of the dreamer in the dream. Smiling at the enemy in a dream is peace and affection. Interpretation of seeing a specific person in a single dream Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream in detail Seeing a person in a dream with a person of high status expresses the abundance of kindness, love, and happiness that you get in reality, and repeating a specific person in a dream is a close marriage to the same person, God willing. Giving someone something valuable from a known person in a dream indicates psychological problems and heartaches that you feel, and may create many problems and disputes between him And between him. Seeing a girl who has never been married before from a person she does not know and giving her many gifts is evidence of good kinship and tenderness between them and he may marry her. Giving a strange man a shirt or pants to a single person indicates that there are many things that will come to the single woman, and the vision may indicate the fulfillment of a promise. Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about a specific person in a dream with a married woman Seeing a married woman repeatedly in a dream means an imminent pregnancy, and receiving gifts or money from him indicates the approach of happiness and improving the marital relationship. Ignoring the friends and relatives of a married woman in a dream is good and indicates liberation from the evil of enemies and a stable life and removing problems and worries by God’s command. Young men who ignore a married woman in a dream have many misfortunes and fears and may indicate poverty and weakness. The familiar person in a married woman’s dream is food, and in the dream of an unmarried woman, she is married, and as for a pregnant woman, the dream shows difficulty or ease of pregnancy according to her relationship with the person Visual. title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream and dreaming of carrying a child

preview.html: To see yourself carrying a child in a dream symbolizes worries and troubles, and whoever sees himself carrying a child in a dream, this indicates blessing and joy, and seeing a beautiful child in a dream means good news, and seeing him carrying the child on his back in a dream shows prevailing brokenness and worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision A child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin explained seeing carrying a child in a dream as fatigue and exhaustion. Whoever sees that he is carrying a male child in a dream, this indicates that he is bearing heavy burdens and burdens, and to see a female child carrying a female child, this indicates good news and glory, and if you see that you are carrying Twin male children in a dream, and this indicates weak enemies and opponents, and a dream of carrying twins indicates abundance and fertility. It has been said that seeing a familiar child being carried in a dream indicates that the dreamer will bring pressure to his family, and whoever sees that he is carrying a strange child in a dream, this indicates that he will fall into Trouble and trouble, and seeing a child carrying a relative in a dream, indicates that there is a problem and disagreements with him, and if you see that you are carrying a nephew or sister in a dream, this indicates that he bears responsibility and care for him. Seeing yourself carrying a newborn in a dream indicates the beginning of new things and actions, and it is He saw that he was carrying a newborn and crying in the dream, this indicates the end of his exhaustion and his emptiness from his distress, and seeing a newborn child crying in the dream, this indicates difficult matters and circumstances. Interpretation of a dream of carrying a child: to see yourself carrying a child in a dream means blessing and joy, and whoever sees that he is carrying a child On his shoulders in a dream, this indicates his superiority in matters, and seeing a child carrying a child in his arms in a dream indicates an increase in good deeds, and a dream of being pregnant with a child. On his back indicates protection and support. Carrying a male child in a dream indicates basic fears and seeing yourself carrying a female child in a dream means getting rid of fears. Whoever sees himself carrying a child and kissing him in a dream indicates that he will get what he hopes for, and that seeing a child carrying a child Caressing him in a dream indicates joy and pleasure. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. I dreamed that I was carrying a beautiful child. If you dream that you are carrying a beautiful child, this indicates good news. Seeing yourself carrying a beautiful child crying in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and distress, and whoever sees that he is carrying a child He laughs beautifully in a dream, this indicates that things will ease his difficulties, and seeing yourself carrying a beautiful sleeping child in a dream indicates rest after fatigue. To see yourself carrying a beautiful child in a dream means that the difficulties will go away and things will become easier, and whoever sees that he is carrying a beautiful newborn in In a dream, this indicates good news. To dream of carrying a beautiful child with blue eyes means comfort and contentment, and whoever sees himself carrying a beautiful child with green eyes in a dream indicates kindness and happiness. Interpretation of carrying a child on his back in a dream: Seeing yourself carrying a child on your back in a dream means Brokenness and lack of immunity.
